=================app.js file==============================
// Return the generated file for download
app.get("/download_data", function (req, res) {
    // Resolve the file path etc... 
    res.download(__dirname + "/views/json/test.json");
});












==================html file=========================
 <li><form class="submitLinkForm" action="/download_data" ><button class="submitLinkButton" type="submit">Export</button></form></li>
